articles.title: Went to my first lakers game of the season on Feb 10 vs the Spurs
articles.original_title: Went to my first lakers game of the season on Feb 10 vs the Spurs
articles.summary: And believe it or not I am not going to complain about almost all of our starters sitting, or the fact that we never led once. What am going to alert all to you is the travesty that is the current Luka plush doll in the team store. My mom got it for me under the guise of going to the bathroom only for her to emerge with a Luka plush. While I of course appreciate my mom’s gift, my problem rather is how badly they portray him. articles.title: Chloe Kim on deck for chance at third straight Olympic gold
articles.original_title: Chloe Kim on deck for chance at third straight Olympic gold
articles.summary: Now, it's Chloe Kim's turn to grasp a special spot in snowboarding's record book.  Kim will be in the halfpipe Thursday night, trying to become the first snowboarder to win three straight Olympic gold medals.  The 25-year-old from California hurt her shoulder four weeks ago, disrupting her lead-in to the Milan Cortina Games.

articles.title: Kawhi catches fire, sinks Rockets with 19-point 4th

articles.summary: Clippers star Kawhi Leonard scored 19 of his 27 points in the fourth quarter, capping his night with a tiebreaking three-point play with 2 seconds left to lift LA past the Rockets.
